Body:
fake_pools = FakePools([Response(200, None, TextContent('Hello, World!'))])
steps = []
async def middleware_one(request, next_handler):
    steps.append(1)
    response = await next_handler(request)
    steps.append(2)
    return response
async with ClientSession(base_url=b'http://localhost:8080', pools=
    fake_pools, middlewares=[middleware_one]) as client:
    response = await client.get(b'/')
    assert steps == [1, 2]
    assert response.status == 200
    text = await response.text()
    assert text == 'Hello, World!'
pytest.mark.asyncio
